snippet.title: Towny Bar - Pre Register Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Towny Bar!

Towny Bar is an idle game in which you will take the reins of an old Bar in Towny Town. It is in your hands to rebuild it and recover its lost prestige.

🏗️ Restore and rebuild your Bar
The old place has been abandoned for many years, it is time for you to take charge of its restoration. Build new rooms, work spaces and lengthen the bar as much as you want 🪑 How far are you willing to go?

⚗️ Make your own drinks
Surprise your customers with unique drinks made by yourself! Discover ancestral recipes to make all kinds of unique drinks from different parts of the world, which combine a wide variety of ingredients. 🍺 Beers, 🍷 wines, ☕ coffees, 🍶 spirits... And a multitude of unique combinations!

🌱 Grow your own ingredients
Your drinks with your ingredients! Grow all kinds of ingredients in your garden, from cereals 🌾 to fruits 🍇 from all over the world, even your own honey! 🍯

🥤 Deliver drinks non-stop
But isn't this a bar? Of course! Your customers are thirsty, so you are going to have to throw them their favorite drinks. Use your fingers to launch the drinks one at a time, or together using the trays.

🕹️ Your own Arcade Room
Build and have fun in your own arcade room. Buy new machines so you and your customers can have fun.

🌞 Work day system
Serve your customers during each day, and deliver as many drinks as you can before time runs out. Can you do better than the day before?

🦸 Masteries and skills
Constantly learn from your actions upgrading Masteries and unlocking new Skills.

🖼️ Decorate the Bar to your liking
Enhance the appearance of your bar with a multitude of decorations that will not only make it look nice, but will also give you unique advantages!

🤝 Make new friends
Meet the inhabitants of the small town of Towny Town, who will help you in your task of improving your Bar.

🧭 Decipher ancient mysteries
Nothing is as it seems, and the old bar hides secrets that no one has yet figured out. Will you be able to find them?

🏆 Rankings and achievements
Obtain a multitude of achievements of various kinds and participate with the community with a variety of leaderboards: Who has opened the most days? Who has built the longest bar? Who has the bar with the highest level of prestige?

✅ Features
▪️ Short games, the days last a few minutes.
▪️ Change the game language at any time
▪️ Notifications that notify you of the end of the tasks in your Bar.
▪️ Cloud save.
▪️ Continue your game on various Android devices.
▪️ Unobtrusive Ads, they are optional and give you bonuses!
▪️ Unlimited games, build as much as you want!
▪️ Future updates planned with new content.

Music Credits:

"Onion Capers" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

"Perspectives" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
